name: Anomaly Detection – Infra – Saturation – More Than Usual CPU Usage Detected on a Node

alertDefProperties.name: Anomaly Detection – Infra – Saturation – More Than Usual CPU Usage Detected on a Node
alertDefProperties.description: Coralogix’s anomaly detection automatically learns typical CPU usage patterns for each node within a cluster, adapting to regular fluctuations such as daily workload cycles or autoscaling events. When a node’s CPU utilization becomes higher than usual (25%) for its established baseline, the alert triggers to indicate potential resource saturation or unbalanced workloads.
